bullets.text: Sole architect and developer of two institutional AI-enabled platforms: Investment Process Demo (model transparency and portfolio traceability); Sales AI Platform (market analysis engine, agentic commentary generator, competitive intelligence framework).
Designed structured agent-based workflows integrating LLM capabilities into research and sales processes.
Participated in ~30 client and prospect meetings within first four months in role.
Lead introductory strategy presentations; coordinate deeper technical follow-up with portfolio managers.
Present to consultants and institutional audiences.
Deliver two guest lectures per semester at Duke University; prior academic presentations at MIT and Oxford.
Authored or significantly contributed to 15+ client-facing research memoranda since November.
Increased outward-facing research cadence; improved speed and consistency of client responses.
Designed systems to standardize prior messaging and improve communication accuracy.
Systems deployed during period of $9B+ net new firm asset growth.
Developed internal metrics to track meeting progression and second-meeting conversion; directional improvement relative to historical norms.
Cross-functional integration spanning research, portfolio management, sales, and IT infrastructure.

Led quantitative research and portfolio management across commodities, multi-asset, and global equity strategies. Initially appointed to lead the active commodity sleeve within the multi-asset platform, later transitioned to oversee equity allocation and portfolio construction within multi-asset mandates. Managed up to $8B in multi-asset portfolios at peak and contributed to broader platform growth reaching tens of billions in AUM during expansion phase.

Designed scalable stock-level risk parity framework incorporating multidimensional risk allocation constraints; reduced portfolio construction runtime from hours to seconds, materially expanding research and backtesting capability.

Architected Defensive Equity platform spanning U.S., International, Small Cap, and Emerging Markets strategies; long-only, low-volatility framework delivering competitive downside protection across cycles.
Designed and launched Defensive Growth suite in 2019, integrating low-volatility efficiency with tailored beta allocation to achieve market-level risk without leverage.
Transitioned framework to incorporate bottom-up stock selection via flagship alpha platform, increasing tracking error above 4% while preserving risk architecture.
Published 9 external research papers and 100+ internal research memoranda.
Raised $700M+ independently across defensive equity and defensive growth strategies.
Led commercialization efforts including client presentations, consultant engagement, and strategy positioning.
Defensive Growth example: International strategy outperformed benchmark by ~5% in 2025.

role: Quantitative Research Analyst | Long-Short Small Cap

bullets.text: Developed quantitative factors and portfolio construction enhancements within a ~$400M U.S. small-cap long-short strategy.

Designed portfolio optimization constraint to maximize differentiation from common institutional factor exposures using fund holdings data, factor crowding metrics, and market microstructure intelligence.

This architecture materially reduced unintended beta exposure during systemic stress. In 2008, while most long-only and long-short portfolios experienced significant drawdowns, the strategy delivered approximately flat performance, ranking at the top of its peer group.
Directed enterprise systems architecture and development teams (30+ direct reports) across distributed, middleware-driven platforms.
Designed distributed inventory intelligence framework for large retail network operating under intermittent connectivity constraints.
Implemented scalable document digitization and retrieval systems for financial and insurance institutions.
Contributed to certification design and technical standards for enterprise imaging middleware; integrated disconnected systems into cohesive enterprise workflows.
